name: A Melody's Story
description:
Help young detective melody to solve her case !

Explore the different scenes, find hints, trigger funny interactions and solve the mystery ! Exploration is highly rewarded in that detective-like game !

Controls :

- click on the ground to move

- click on a green object to trigger an action

- click on the folder to open your files

- click on a profile to read it

- click on two hints to fuse them

Have fun !!
